translation: The action {{.action_title}}, regarding case file {{.casefile_name}} was just completed by {{.assignee}}.
The following action was assigned to you: {{.action_title}}. Accept and complete this action in the app 'ActionChanger' on your mobile device.
Action '{{.action_title}}' has been assigned to you
The action {{.action_title}} was just completed by {{.assignee}}.
{{.assignee}} rejected and re-assigned this action to you {{.action_title}}.
{{.owner}} has reassigned the action {{.action_title}} to someone else. You are no longer responsible.
A new observation #{{ .refnumber }} with severity {{ .severity }} was just submitted by {{.observer}}.
Warning! A new observation #{{ .refnumber }} with severity {{ .severity }} was just submitted by {{.observer}}. This might require your immediate attention.

A new observation #{{ .refnumber }} with severity {{ .severity }} was just submitted by {{.observer}}. This observation has been automatically generated from inspection {{ .template_name }} #{{ .inspection_number }}.

Warning! A new observation #{{ .refnumber }} with severity {{ .severity }} was just submitted by {{.observer}}. This might require your immediate attention. This observation has been automatically generated from inspection {{ .template_name }} #{{ .inspection_number }}.
Warning! High priority observation #{{ .refnumber }} generated from inspection
The following case file was assigned to you by {{.assigner}}: {{.casefile_name}}.
Thank you for your observation! Your observation #{{.refnumber}} has been archived by {{.manager}}.
Thank you for your observation! Your observation #{{.refnumber}} is being processed by {{.manager}}.
{{ .assigner }} has assigned a new inspection {{ .template_name }} to you.

Your {{ .template_name }} inspection #{{ .refnumber }} download is ready.{{ if .khabar_attached }}
Evidence files are attached.{{ end }}
Please find attached the file with the requested export data.

Congratulations, you have been invited by {{ .creator }} to join {{ .organization }} on Safety Changer!

{{ if .password }}

Your password to access Safety Changer is: {{ .password }}

{{ end }}
Your Safety Changer account has been created!

You've received this mail because of a request to (re)set your Safety Changer password.

{{ if .succeeded }}Either an administrator created or updated your account, or you have requested for a password reset.

If you do not want to change your password, please discard this e-mail.{{ else }}However, you cannot reset your password as your account is locked by an administrator. Please contact an administrator to unlock your account.{{ end }}

{{ if .failed }}Your request to create a template from a shared code has failed. You may have used a wrong or expired key, please try again.{{else}}Your request to create a template from a shared code has succeeded. It is now available under the name {{ .template_name }}.{{end}}
